javadoc:
Creates a panel that displays an {@link Image}. Users may pan the image as desired and zoom the
 image according to specific zoom levels.

methods.javadoc: Create an NavigableImagePanel with the specified image
methods.name: <init>
methods.comment: Create an NavigableImagePanel with the specified image

methods.javadoc:
Set the image this panel should display
@param image the new image to display
methods.name: setImage
methods.comment: Set the image this panel should display

methods.javadoc:
Get the currently-displayed image
@return the current image
methods.name: getImage
setImageBackgroundColor
methods.comment:
Set the background color of the panel. If the specified color is null, the 
 default color for panel backgrounds is used.

methods.javadoc:
Get the current background color of this panel
@return the background color
methods.name: getImageBackgroundColor
methods.comment: Get the current background color of this panel

methods.javadoc:
Get the current zoom factor the image is being drawn to
@return the image magnification factor
methods.name: getZoomFactor
methods.comment: Get the current zoom factor the image is being drawn to

methods.javadoc:
Set the magnification factor of the image. The zoom parameter is aligned to the 
 nearest pre-configured magnification factor, rounding down for zoom factors less than 
 1.0, and up for factors greater than 1.0. Zoom factors outside the pre-configured range
 are limited to the nearest range extent.
@param zoom
methods.name: setZoomFactor
methods.comment:
Set the magnification factor of the image. The zoom parameter is aligned to the 
 nearest pre-configured magnification factor, rounding down for zoom factors less than 
 1.0, and up for factors greater than 1.0. Zoom factors outside the pre-configured range
 are limited to the nearest range extent.

methods.name: setDefaultZoomFactor
methods.comment: Set the default zoom level, adhering to the same set of constrains as #setZoomFactor(float)

methods.javadoc:
Determine if the image can zoom in further based on current magnification levels
@return True if magnification steps are available, false otherwise
methods.name: canZoomIn
methods.comment: Determine if the image can zoom in further based on current magnification levels

return.comment: True if magnification steps are available, false otherwise

methods.javadoc: Enlarge the image about the image center
methods.name: zoomIn
methods.comment: Enlarge the image about the image center

methods.javadoc:
Enlarge the image about the given point
@param center location to enlarge the image around
methods.name: zoomIn
methods.comment: Enlarge the image about the given point

params.name: center
params.comment: location to enlarge the image around

methods.javadoc:
Determine if the image can zoom out further based on current magnification levels
@return True if (de-)magnification steps are available, false otherwise
methods.name: canZoomOut
methods.comment: Determine if the image can zoom out further based on current magnification levels

return.comment: True if (de-)magnification steps are available, false otherwise

methods.javadoc: Shrink the image about the image center
methods.name: zoomOut
methods.comment: Shrink the image about the image center

methods.javadoc:
Shrink the image about the given point
@param center location to shrink the image around
methods.name: zoomOut
methods.comment: Shrink the image about the given point

params.name: center
params.comment: location to shrink the image around

methods.javadoc: Move the image back to the center. Zoom factor is unmodified.
methods.name: resetImageTranslation
methods.comment: Move the image back to the center. Zoom factor is unmodified.

methods.javadoc:
Determine if the image has been moved from its original location
@return True if the image has moved, false otherwise
methods.name: isTranslated
methods.comment: Determine if the image has been moved from its original location

return.comment: True if the image has moved, false otherwise

methods.javadoc:
Get the X-Y distance the image has moved
@return the X-Y distances the image has moved
methods.name: getTranslation
methods.comment: Get the X-Y distance the image has moved

return.comment: the X-Y distances the image has moved

name: ImagePanel
comment:
Creates a panel that displays an Image. Users may pan the image as desired and zoom the
 image according to specific zoom levels.

fields.javadoc: Property name that indicates the image displayed by this panel has changed
fields.name: IMAGE_PROPERTY
fields.comment: Property name that indicates the image displayed by this panel has changed

fields.javadoc: Property name that indicates the zoom level of the image has changed
fields.name: ZOOM_PROPERTY
fields.comment: Property name that indicates the zoom level of the image has changed

fields.javadoc: Property name that indicates the default zoom level of the image has changed
fields.name: DEFAULT_ZOOM_PROPERTY
fields.comment: Property name that indicates the default zoom level of the image has changed

fields.javadoc: Property name that indicates the image has been translated
fields.name: TRANSLATION_PROPERTY
fields.comment: Property name that indicates the image has been translated
